column1: Table 5-20:  Quantitative Uncertainty Estimates of N2O Emissions from Agricultural Soil Management in 2019 (MMT CO2 Eq. and Percent)

column1: Note: Due to lack of data, uncertainties in PRP manure N production, other organic fertilizer amendments, and biosolids (i.e., treated sewage sludge) amendments to soils are currently treated as certain; these sources of uncertainty will be included in future Inventory reports.
